original_text: and out of the tribe of Gad, Ramoth in Gilead with its pasturelands, the city of refuge for the manslayer, Mahanaim with its pasturelands,
korean_text: 갓 지파 중에서 준 것은 살인자의 도피성 길르앗 라못과 그 목초지이요 또 마하나임과 그 목초지와

sentences.original_text: and out of the tribe of Gad,
Ramoth in Gilead with its pasturelands,
the city of refuge for the manslayer,
